name: sim-engine
description: Engine-agnostic simulation core (attempt -> consequence -> events) with a headless runner.

scripts.test:sim: RUN_SIM_TESTS=1 npm run build:test && RUN_SIM_TESTS=1 node --test dist-test/test/*.test.js
scripts.test:slow: RUN_SLOW_TESTS=1 npm run build:test && RUN_SLOW_TESTS=1 node --test dist-test/test/*.test.js
scripts.start: npm run build && node dist/cli.js run --days 30 --seed 1
scripts.sim: npm run build && node dist/cli.js run
scripts.sim:events: npm run build && node dist/cli.js run --events --events-limit 200
scripts.sim:events:attempts: npm run build && node dist/cli.js run --events --events-kind attempt.recorded --events-limit 200
scripts.sim:save-events: npm run build && node dist/cli.js run --save-events
scripts.sim:log:summary: npm run build && node dist/cli.js summarize-log
scripts.sim:story: npm run build && node dist/cli.js story
scripts.sim:npcs: npm run build && node dist/cli.js npcs
scripts.sim:npc: npm run build && node dist/cli.js npc
scripts.sim:npc:history: npm run build && node dist/cli.js npc-history
scripts.viewer:service: npm run build && node dist/cli.js viewer --seed 1 --port 8787 --ms-per-tick 60000 --play
scripts.sim:npcs:villageA: npm run build && node dist/cli.js npcs --days 0 --seed 1 --site HumanVillageA --limit 30
scripts.sim:npcs:villageB: npm run build && node dist/cli.js npcs --days 0 --seed 1 --site HumanVillageB --limit 30
scripts.sim:npcs:port: npm run build && node dist/cli.js npcs --days 0 --seed 1 --site HumanCityPort --limit 30
scripts.sim:npcs:elvenCity: npm run build && node dist/cli.js npcs --days 0 --seed 1 --site ElvenCity --limit 30
scripts.sim:npcs:elvenTown: npm run build && node dist/cli.js npcs --days 0 --seed 1 --site ElvenTownFortified --limit 30
scripts.sim:npc:example: npm run build && node dist/cli.js npc --days 3 --seed 1 --id npc:25
